TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider extends System.Web.Security.RoleProvider

summary.span: 在 XML 文件中、Active Directory 中或 Active Directory 应用程序模式服务器上管理 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色成员资格信息在授权管理器策略存储区中的存储。

span.span: Manages storage of role-membership information for an ASP.NET application in an authorization-manager policy store, either in an XML file, in an Active Directory, or on an Active Directory Application Mode server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类由和类来提供 ASP.NET 应用程序使用授权管理器存储的角色管理服务。This class is used by the and classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using an authorization-manager store. 角色管理可用于为你的应用程序指定不同级别的授权。You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application. 可以使用 Microsoft 管理控制台访问的授权管理器。The authorization manager can be accessed using the Microsoft Management Console. 对象窗体身份验证模式和适用于这两个 Windows 身份验证。The object works with both Windows authentication and forms authentication modes. 你可以配置要使用本地的 XML 文件或 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器对象。You can configure the object to use either a local XML file or an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. 使用本地文件时，连接字符串应类似下面的示例。When using a local file, the connection string should look like the following example. ``` msxml:// ``` 如果本地文件存储在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的目录树中，你可以使用波形符 ("~") 字符，用于指示的根目录。If the local file is stored in the directory tree of an ASP.NET Web application, you can use the tilde ("~") character to indicate the root directory. 例如，若要指示，本地文件存储在 Web 应用程序的数据目录中，将使用类似于下面的示例连接字符串。For example, to indicate that the local file is stored in the Web application's data directory, you would use a connection string similar to the following example. `msxml://~\App_Data\datafilename.xml` > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Web 应用程序目录中存储 XML 数据文件是一个潜在的安全威胁。Storing an XML data file in the Web application directory is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，IIS 将提供给 Web 的 XML 数据文件。By default, IIS will serve XML data files to the Web. 为了提高安全性，使用 ASP.NET 应用程序中的本地数据文件时，应将存储中的数据文件`App_Data`目录。To improve security when using a local data file in an ASP.NET application, you should store the data file in the `App_Data` directory. 文件存储在`App_Data`目录将不会发送到 Web。Files stored in the `App_Data` directory will not be served to the Web. 如果为策略存储区中使用的 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器，你的连接字符串应类似于下面的示例。If you are using an Active Directory or ADAM server for the policy store, your connection string should be similar to the following example. `msldap://myserver/CN=MyAzManStore,OU=MyOU,DC=MyDomain,DC=MyDC,DC=Com` 列出有关的文档中的异常对象方法是引发的异常对象。The exceptions listed in the documentation for object methods are the exceptions that are raised by the object. 由于提供程序依赖于基础身份验证管理器运行时，异常可能是每当引发对象将转发到身份验证管理器运行时方法调用。Since the provider relies on the underlying Authentication Manager runtime, a exception may be thrown whenever the object forwards a method call to the Authentication Manager runtime. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象具有在部分信任环境中运行的以下要求：The object has the following requirements for running in partial-trust environments: > > 当使用基于文件的策略存储区 ASP.NET 应用程序中，当前的信任级别授予的文件 I/O 权限确定是否读取和写入操作所允许的提供程序。When using a file-based policy store in an ASP.NET application, the file I/O permissions granted by the current trust level determine whether read and write actions are allowed by the provider. ASP.NET 应用程序必须具有读取权限，才能从策略存储中，读取数据文件，并且必须具有写权限以便保存新的信息或更新现有策略存储中的信息。The ASP.NET application must have read permission on the file to read data from the policy store, and must have write permission to save new information or update existing information in the policy store. 默认中等信任策略文件授予其应用程序目录中的 ASP.NET 应用程序读/写权限。The default Medium-trust policy file gives an ASP.NET application read/write permissions in its application directory. 默认值低信任级别策略文件只授予读取权限在其应用程序目录中的 ASP.NET 应用程序。The default Low-trust policy file only gives an ASP.NET application read permission in its application directory. 此外，在其下运行 ASP.NET 应用程序的进程标识必须具有文件系统权限以读取和/或写策略文件。In addition, the process identity under which the ASP.NET application runs must have file-system permissions to read and/or write the policy file. > > 使用 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器时，ASP.NET 应用程序需要非托管代码的权限，因为内部对象代码使用 COM 互操作。When using an Active Directory or ADAM server, the ASP.NET application needs unmanaged-code permission because the internal object code uses COM interop. > > 使用时对象在 ASP.NET 外，调用代码需要非托管代码的权限。When using the object outside of ASP.NET, the calling code needs unmanaged-code permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示设置为使用的 Web.config 文件为角色管理。The following code example shows a Web.config file set to use the for role management. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类将一个或多个用户与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中的一个或多个角色关联。The method is called by the class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 调用此方法， ， ，和方法类。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

span.span: One of the specified user names is .
One of the specified role names is .

exception.span: 指定的角色名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号 (,)。

Public Overrides Property ApplicationName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.

value.span: 默认值为当前 的 属性值。

span.span: The default is the property value for the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由要将用户和角色关联的不同的授权管理器应用程序，使多个 ASP.NET 应用程序以使用相同的授权管理器策略存储来存储角色信息而未重复的角色名称之间发生冲突。The is used by the to associate users and roles with different authorization-manager applications, which enables multiple ASP.NET applications to use the same authorization-manager policy store to store role information without running into conflicts between duplicate role names. 或者，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的策略存储属性。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same policy store by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性也可以设置以声明方式在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中使用`applicationName`属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the application's Web.config file by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`属性在 Web.config 文件中，则当前属性值使用对象。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the Web.config file, then the property value for the current object is used. > [!NOTE] > 授权管理器应用程序名称不能包含"/"字符中包含属性。Authorization-manager application names cannot contain the "/" character that is included in the property. 因此，默认值为属性不能用作授权管理器应用程序名称，并在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中，你必须始终指定`applicationName`属性中`provider`元素来配置你实例。As a result, the default value for the property cannot be used as an authorization-manager application name, and in the application's Web.config file, you must always specify an `applicationName` attribute in the `provider` element to configure your instance. > [!CAUTION] > 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化有多个用户的应用程序时，属性值可能导致意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 我们建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置属性除非必要，否则。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定应用程序的实例并设置属性`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the property to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/createrolecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/createrolevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中删除角色。The method is called by the class to delete a role from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 当删除角色时，与该角色关联的用户列表也将删除从策略存储区。When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the policy store. 不会影响数据库中的用户信息。The user information in the database is not affected. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`然后将引发异常，将不删除此角色，如果通过标识角色`roleName`参数具有一个或多个成员。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members. 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，则它是空的还是不会删除此角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not. ## Examples 下面的示例从授权管理器策略存储区中删除一个角色。The following example deletes a role from the authorization-manager policy store. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/deleterolecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/deleterolevb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类来检索与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的指定角色关联的用户的列表。The method is called by the class to retrieve the list of users associated with the specified role in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 方法仅返回直接包含的用户名称中由指定的授权管理器角色`roleName`参数。The method only returns user names that are directly contained in the authorization-manager role specified by the `roleName` parameter. 基础授权管理器 API 调用方法不支持组扩展，因此不会返回嵌套的 NT 组、 嵌套的授权管理器组和 LDAP 查询组中包含的用户。The underlying authorization-manager API called by the method does not support group expansion, so users contained in nested NT groups, nested authorization-manager groups, and LDAP query groups will not be returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以对特定角色中获取的用户的列表，并将绑定到结果控件。The following code example uses the method to get a list of the users in a particular role and bind the results to a control. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类和方法属性来确定用户是否为 ASP.NET 应用程序中指定授权管理器数据存储区中的角色相关联配置文件 (Web.config)。The method is called by the class and the method of the property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). ## Examples 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查以确定登录的用户是否管理员角色允许用户查看用户角色之前。The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类，以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的一个或多个角色中删除一个或多个用户。The method is called by the class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 调用此方法， ， ，和方法类。This method is called by the , , , and methods of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role. 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅。For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/CS/adduserstorolecs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider/VB/adduserstorolevb.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string ScopeName { get; set; }
.property instance string ScopeName
Public Property ScopeName As String
public: property System::String ^ ScopeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置授权存储区的范围名。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope name for the authorization store.
The scope name for the authorization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置使用`scopeName`中的提供程序实例的配置属性`providers`在配置部分。The property can be set using the `scopeName` configuration attribute for the provider instance in the `providers` section of the configuration section. > [!CAUTION] > 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化有多个用户的应用程序时，属性值可能导致意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application. 我们建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置属性除非必要，否则。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you must. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
